meanings.definition: Modernest: the superlative form of modern, meaning most modern or up-to-date.
meanings.sent1: The new smartphone model is the modernest in the store.
meanings.sent2: This building has the modernest architecture in the city.
meanings.sent3: She always wants the modernest gadgets, even if they are not necessary.
meanings.sent4: His ideas are the modernest breeze in the stale room of tradition.
meanings.sent5: The modernest trends in fashion change rapidly.

meanings.definition: Modernest: used to describe the most modern or current style or design.
meanings.sent1: The fashion show displayed the modernest clothing trends.
meanings.sent2: Their house has the modernest interior design I've ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The modernest furniture made the room look like a futuristic movie set.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork is the modernest painting that captures the essence of today.
meanings.sent5: The modernest technology is constantly evolving.

meanings.definition: Modernest: the most recent or contemporary in time.
meanings.sent1: The modernest movie releases are always packed with viewers.
meanings.sent2: The modernest scientific discoveries are changing the world.
meanings.sent3: He tried to be the modernest by always talking about the latest news.
meanings.sent4: The modernest events in history shape our present and future.
meanings.sent5: Living in the modernest era has its challenges and advantages.
